questions.question: Which two QoS tools provides congestion management?
Refer to the exhibit. An engineer must configure GigabitEthernet1/1 to accommodate voice and data traffic. Which configuration accomplishes this task?

choices:
Interface gigabitethernet 1/1
Switchport mode access
Switchport access vlan 300
Switchport voice vlan 400

Interface gigabitethernet 1/1
Switchport mode trunk
Switchport trunk vlan 300
Switchport voice vlan 400

Interface gigabitethernet 1/1
Switchport mode trunk
Switchport trunk vlan 300
Switchport trunk vlan 400

Interface gigabitethernet 1/1
Switchport mode access
Switchport voice vlan 300
Switchport access vlan 400

questions.question: Drag and drop the TCP/IP protocols from the left onto the transmission protocols on the right.
Drag and drop the 802.11 wireless standards from the left onto the matching statements on the right.

pairs.right: Operates in the 2.4GHz band only and supports a maximum data rate of 54 Mbps
Operates in the 5GHz band only and supports a maximum data rate that can exceed 100 Mbps
supports a maximum data rate of 11 Mbps
Operates in the 5GHz band only and supports a maximum data rate of 54 Mbps
